name: GalacticBrigadeM-4
description:
Galactic Brigade is a 3rd person shooter space battle game in which the player commandeers a space ship. The player must survive by shooting and destroying enemy ships to continue their journey through space. 

There is a main screen to start or quit the game, a first level that acts as a starter level,  and a second level where you must collect parts and destroy ships. There is a second variant (purple ships) that are faster, shoot different bullets that flash, and deal more damage. After beating this second level, you will be taken to a win screen to return to the main menu.

Controls:

Arrow keys - Move the ship around

Enter key - Accelerate

Space bar - Shoot

Press ESC during game play to quit.

All textures, models, particle effect sprites, and opening and ending theme created by myself.
